
==replay::math::intersection_test Reference==
Primitive intersection tests. 
====line_sphere====
{{{
  bool replay::math::intersection_test::line_sphere(const linear_component3 &line, const vector3f &center, const float radius, float *lambda0=0, float *lambda1=0, float epsilon=default_epsilon)
}}}
  Test for intersection of a line and a sphere. This purposefully ignores differences between line, ray and segment and treats all as lines. lineLinear component to test. centerCenter of the sphere. radiusRadius of the sphere. lambda0Line parameter for the first intersection. lambda1Line parameter for the second intersection. epsilonError tolerance to use for the quadratic root finder.
